# DARWHIN GOMEZ

New York, New York | 347-491-2955  
Darwhin88@gmail.com  | [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/darwhin) | [GitHub](https://github.com/dw8888)  

---

## EDUCATION  
**City University of New York**  
Master of Science in Data Science and Machine Learning, Expected Jan 2026, GPA: 4.0  
Bachelor of Technology in Computer Information Systems, June 2024, GPA: 3.78  
- Dean’s List (5x), National Honor Society  

---

## PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE  
**Solutions Architect Intern**  
Amazon Web Services (AWS) | Arlington, VA (Remote/Hybrid)  
Jun 2025 – Sep 2025  
- Designed and presented secure, scalable AWS architectures tailored to enterprise client needs.  
- Developed proof-of-concept (POC) solutions integrating Generative AI and data analytics to discover actionable business insights from constituent sentiment.  
- Built and deployed a fully automated sentiment analysis pipeline processing over 1M feedback records, enabling 5× faster feedback-to-action turnaround through real-time dashboards.  
- Fine-tuned foundational models in Amazon SageMaker, achieving a 5% increase in output accuracy and an 8% reduction in toxicity.  

**Software Developer Intern**  
WOPLLI Technologies | Remote, NY  
Jun 2024 – Sep 2024  
- Designed a Virtual Credential System for decentralized identity ecosystems.  
- Configured and tested Azure environments for secure application hosting.  
- Developed data flow and architecture diagrams aligned with governance policies.  

**IT Support Intern**  
Mayor’s Office of Information Services | New York, NY  
Feb 2024 – May 2024  
- Automated troubleshooting with Python scripts, reducing manual workload.  
- Monitored security logs to identify abnormal activities, escalating when appropriate.  
- Supported VIP users, ensuring secure system access through Active Directory and VPN.  

**IT Instructor Assistant**  
RF CUNY & Generation USA (Choose-U) | Remote, NY  
Feb 2022 – Aug 2023  
- Delivered 36 lessons on IT support, Linux, PowerShell, and scripting for 200+ learners.  
- Achieved a 96% cohort graduation rate by tailoring instruction with learner data insights.  

---

## TECHNICAL PROJECTS  
**Alfred: Personal Agentic Job Search Assistant**  
- Designed and developed a personal agentic job search assistant using FastAPI and OpenAI GPT-4.1 for automated resume and cover letter generation.  
- Implemented a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) system using PostgreSQL to store and retrieve personal work data as embeddings.  
- Established a CI/CD pipeline and Docker deployment for the FastAPI server, ensuring robust and integrated core features.  

**Financial Stocks Report Webpage**  
- Developed a dynamic stock reporting web app using PHP, MySQL, JavaScript, and Bootstrap.  
- Optimized query execution for a 65,000+ record database, ensuring fast load times.  

**Forecasting ATM Cash Demand Using Time Series Models**  
- Built ARIMA-based time series models in R to predict ATM cash demand, improving forecast accuracy.  

---

## CORE SKILLS  
- **Programming Languages:** Python, SQL, R, Java, JavaScript  
- **Data Science & ML:** Statistical Modeling, Forecasting, Anomaly Detection  
- **Databases:** MSSQL, MySQL, NoSQL, Data Normalization  
- **Tools & Frameworks:** Git, Docker, Tableau, Power BI  
- **Soft Skills:** Excellent Verbal and Written Communication, Collaboration, Problem-Solving  

---

## LANGUAGES  
- English (Fluent)  
- Spanish (Fluent)
